name: lke-plugin-image-export
description: Allow custom image export of a graph

scripts.build:public: tsc -b src/public && cd src/public/dist && browserify *.js --debug -o ../../../custom-image-export.lke/public/index.js && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp -R src/public/assets custom-image-export.lke/public && cp src/public/index.html custom-image-export.lke/public
scripts.installProduction: cp package.json custom-image-export.lke && cd custom-image-export.lke && npm install --production

author: Linkurious SAS
